message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but I'm only able to go up to $130 right now.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I can't go as low as $130.  Would you consider meeting in the middle at $135?
